data.title: FAlCon-DNS: Framework of time schemes for direct numerical simulation of annular convection
data.name: FAlCon-DNS
data.description: FAlCon-DNS (Framework of time schemes for Direct Numerical Simulation of Annular Convection) is a code to solve 2D thermal convection in an annulus. It has a suite of IMEX time integration schemes.

evidence: "This code is written to solve for 2 D convection in an annulus and analyse different time integration schemes."
"It was created from scratch as part of the PhD work at the Geomagnetism Group, Institute de Physique du Globe de Paris (IPGP), Universite de Paris."
Build and run instructions use source directly: "Check the compilers in the Makefile and go to source directory: $ cd src $ make clean $ make all" and then run "./main input.txt".
